​ org.gnome.OTPClient ​ CC0-4.0 ​ GPL-3.0+ ​ OTPClient ​ Manage TOTP and HOTP tokens in a secure way ​ ​ ​
​ Easy to use GTK+ application for securely managing TOTP and HOTP tokens. The content is encrypted on the disk using AES256-GCM and the master password is derived using PBKDF2 with 100k iterations and SHA512 as hash algorithm. It's also possible to import encrypted backups from andOTP and Authenticator+. ​ ​ ​ ​ org.gnome.OTPClient.desktop ​ ​ ​ ​ Main window ​ https://github.com/paolostivanin/OTPClient/blob/master/data/screenshots/mainwin.png ​ ​ ​ Add tokens ​ https://github.com/paolostivanin/OTPClient/blob/master/data/screenshots/addtokens.png ​ ​ ​ ​ https://github.com/paolostivanin/OTPClient ​ ​ ​ otpclient ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
